channel.title: Sites like bitsdujour.com
channel.description:
What are the sites for sale at discounted prices? Such as bitsdujour.com?
Also interested in sites where I can sell a specific software, such as http://gorgeous-karnaugh.com. I found only this - http://www.academicsuperstore.com, but did not understand how to place there my software, and was unable to contact the owners.
